name: harvest
caption: Harvest

effect.short: Has a 50% chance of restoring a used Berry after each turn if the Pokémon has held no items in the meantime.
effect.full: After each turn, if the last item this Pokémon consumed was a Berry and it is not currently holding an item, it has a 50% chance of regaining that Berry, or a 100% chance during [strong sunlight]{mechanic:strong-sunlight}.

flavorText: May create another Berry after one is used.
